content:
Further to your own knowledge, I want you to consider the following information on
HIA Small Works

This contract is suitable for residential building work where no home warranty insurance is required. It should not be used where the cost of the work is greater than $20,0000

It is suitable for use in the manufacture, supply and installation of cabinets and related works, bathroom renovations, carports, garages, pergolas and other small jobs costing less than $20,000.
I want you to remember this as part of our conversation. Do you understand?

Please write in English language.
